alert.note: Alert for Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 6:22PM CDT until June 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Smith County in central Mississippi... Southern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 621 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Forest, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Homewood around 630 PM CDT. Pulaski around 640 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
